column5: Was supposed to be today but was rescheduled to next sat.  I am  excited never fished a tournament before.  Will be in. Our old century hardtop. Say hi if you see me.  Team "Cheap Thrills"     Saturday May 30/2015 Fisherman's Pier Hamilton ONT (under the skyway)  Skyway Salmon challenge  registration 5am-6:15am  630am blast off outside the pier  must be inside the pier at 230pm  $40/person  max 6 rods per team  Heaviest 3 Salmon box (coho/Chinook)  pays 50% 30% 20%  optional $20 big fish "Calcutta"
